programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a nurse starts experiencing a variety of flu-like symptoms, she discovers that she is HIV-positive; she learns that her infection was not accidental.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: time of death becomes pivotal when a pregnant woman is found murdered in her air-conditioned bedroom.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An obscure print found at a crime scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A diner in a small town, an endocrinologist and a forensic botanist help destroy a prime suspect's alibi.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a Michigan State University grad student disappears and is presumed dead, a professor of geological sciences helps police get the dirt on her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a man's wife kills herself 14 years after his college sweetheart commits suicide, police start to get suspicious.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman gets shot in her driveway; she may have been the victim of a co-worker half her age that she had recently rejected.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A pair of tennis shoes are found near a victim who had been stabbed on the beach, less than ten yards from her hotel.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three fingerprints on a window screen are enough for a print examiner to uncover the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: With a long list of suspects, forensic experts agree on one thing in this brutal murder: the killer knew his victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The only lead to finding a serial killer on the loose is a bloody fingerprint on the body of a victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tests reveal the race, eye color and hair color of the person responsible for killing two young women on Halloween night.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A convicted arsonist claims his innocence and with no lawyer, no money and only a fifth-grade education, sets out to prove it.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A canine behaviorist uses the family dogs, who are the only witnesses, to find the murderer of their owner.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators see through a killer trying to cover his tracks by staging the crime scene to learn what really happened.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young girl beaten after watching her grandmother killed, identifies the wrong person; years later she tries to change her statement.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984 police failed to convict the murderer of a college student; new technology may finally help the police to catch her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police investigate a young woman found murdered two weeks after reporting a road rage incident; evidence leads not to the aggressive driver, but one of their own.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman who survived a deadly childhood fire sends police a letter charging that her father killed her mother 30 years ago.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After more than 20 people on a Native American reservation die suddenly from a flu-like disease, Navajo medicine men provide a clue that leads to a most unlikely killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While at a real estate conference in St. Louis, a man finds his wife drowned in the bathtub in their hotel room.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A cunning serial rapist who leaves no decisive evidence forces investigators to rely on geographical profiling in their search for an identity; DNA from a cigarette butt may provide the final piece of evidence needed to catch the suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: New evidence including fibers and weather patterns point to a different killer in the 1986 case of a Pennsylvania dentist's murdered wife.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Insects and a single strand of hair uncover an additional suspect in the killing of a young mother and her baby in Lehigh Valley, Pa.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A decomposed body is found in a barrel, and a dilapidated address book may hold the answer, but investigators must find a way to read the pages because the passage of 30 years has turned them blank.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a policeman's home burns to the ground, he later arrests a man who confesses to arson, but the confession seems dubious.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman identifies her husband as her attacker, but questions arise 16 years later regarding her recollections.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young girl is found dead, the victim of an apparent sex killer; there are few clues to the killer's identity, but authorities are intrigued by unusual orange fibers embedded in clothing found near the victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police charge Alan "The Zenith Man" Ridley with murdering his wife, Virginia, but following an autopsy, medical detectives believe he may not have killed his wife after all.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: With children dying at an alarming rate at a Texas hospital, authorities narrow down their probe to one nurse, but the murder weapon remains elusive.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the decomposed body of a young girl is discovered, police have no clues to her identity, but days earlier, a stabbing victim told them she thought she might have witnessed a murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a doctor's wife disappears, investigators use concrete from the doctor's yard and the recollections of a child to determine what happened.

programme.desc: Stories from across the world and refreshing conversations with Audie Cornish.

programme.desc: Melanie Zanona; Catherine Lucey; Isaac Arnsdorf.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Neighbors do not hear the gunshots when a union official is killed in his home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man tells police he shot an intruder who murdered his wife; forensic evidence leads police to re-examine the man's motives.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A police officer claims his estranged wife's shooting death was a suicide, but investigators think it was a murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When fire fighters find a family dead inside their home, it appears to be a murder-suicide; clues at the scene lead investigators to believe otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A couple's murder leads investigators into the world of white supremacists and a string of hate crimes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A rare gun and a victim's beloved dog help investigators trying to solve a multi-year long murder case where most of the witnesses were admitted drug users.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A search in Virginia's DNA databank reveals the identity of a news producer's murderer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A homicide detective claims his wife accidentally shot herself in the head, but the evidence indicates otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Officials probe the death of a woman investigating the possible side effects of the drug she was prescribed for bipolar disorder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A chip of stainless steel brings a killer to justice 20 years after a woman's body is found in a ravine.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An 11-year-old girl is sexually assaulted and shot twice at close range.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is killed weeks before testifying against the man who sexually assaulted her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: New York police hunt the Zodiac killer after a series of deadly attacks.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a healthy young man dies mysteriously in his sleep, toxicology tests reveal that it may have been foul play. Could a `suicide note' hold the key to solving the case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a single mother is murdered, her brother vows to find the person responsible for the death of his sister, even if it takes more than 30 years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A husband and wife get shot and their 16-year-old daughter manages to escape, but investigators suspect she may be involved in the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After 10 years, a witness decides to do the right thing about the rape and murder of a young hairdresser.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police investigate the possibility of a hate crime when two women go missing and are later found murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a human skeleton is found on marshland and determined to be at least 18 months old, a computer consultant gives her a face and name.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer places all the incriminating evidence to the murder in a plastic bag, hoping it will float down the river.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman's body is found inside a burned mobile home and the autopsy reveals she was beaten, making this a murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Security guard who disappeared from his post was found a year later in a remote camp site; a decade later, a phone call and a paint smear on his boot helped scientists determine what happened during his final moments.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When three students are brutally murdered close to campus, investigators must determine what the women had in common before their serial killer strikes again.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A bag full of evidence recovered from an iced-over river helps to reveal the murderer of a businesswoman in her own shop.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Eyewitness to real estate agent's murder is put under forensic hypnosis in an attempt to help him recall the killer's face.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police launch a search for a killer after a teenager returns home to find his father's body in a pool of blood.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Pathologist examining the death of a politician who was running for re-election finds tiny puncture wounds at the autopsy.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Naval officer who threatened to go public with tales of on-the-job sexual harassment and assault is brutally murdered, but when investigators find the allegations could be part of an elaborate scheme for money, they turn to forensic science.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Romanian archbishop Valerian D. Trifa, living in the U.S., is accused of being a Nazi war criminal, and forensic experts find evidence on an incriminating, 40-year-old postcard.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators look into the shooting death of Russ Stager, a popular gym teacher, and discover that his death was not an accident; a message the victim recorded before his death reveals a story of greed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A money launderer is found dead in the ocean and the only obvious clues to his identity are a Rolex watch and a tattoo; the anchor with which he is weighed down proves most helpful in solving the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The apparent suicide of Dr. Darryl Sutorius, a respected heart surgeon, is questioned when an investigation reveals his new wife's violent history.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1992 hit-and-run death of 6-year-old Nicole Rae Walker leads to a groundbreaking trial as experts submit a video reconstruction of the incident, implicating a drunk driver and demonstrating the viability of video testimony.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Specialists including a NASA vendor help police reconstruct a damaged surveillance video to catch the murderer of convenience store employee Wanda Mason in Lansing, Mich.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young woman goes missing, the police investigation reveals that she led a double life -- student by day, call girl by night -- but when her body is discovered, even more strange truths are uncovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A tiny clue inside a suspect's watchband and a popular television show help solve the case of a woman's disappearance.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One year after Maine resident Pearl A. Bruns' disappearance, forensic technology helps to find her body and determine who was responsible for her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When 4-year-old April Renee Tucker is found dead in her backyard, her parents tell the police that neighborhood dogs attacked and killed her, but the injuries on her body don't match their account of what happened.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: San Diego police investigate the murder of a missing person whose hands turn up in a dumpster; an anonymous letter, containing details only the killer would know, offers clues to solving the case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One year after her father's death, a teen's role in a high school production of "Hamlet" causes her to reveal the chilling truth behind her family's tragedy.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother puts her hope in the internet and an independent investigation to clear her name after authorities charge her with murdering her 17-month-old son in a fire considered to be intentionally set.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a man dies unexpectedly in the office of a noted California doctor, police begin what they think will be a routine investigation, but discoveries of false identities and insurance fraud raise questions about the doctor's role.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A son who is convinced of his mother's innocence in the death of his father enrolls in law school to try and clear her name.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Despite a patient's claim that the cut to his hand had been caused by a dumpster, the doctor treating the injury recognizes it as something else -- and soon becomes the chief witness in a murder case.

programme.desc: The anchors share the latest stories about significant events that take place across the world and interview prominent figures.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A child's memory, a diary and a forensic psychologist help investigators solve a young woman's murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators weigh several theories while probing the death of a retired police officer, including a botched robbery and suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The bodies of two young women are found in the ashes of an apartment fire.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two different men report the murder of a single mother and when the case's other anomalies stall the police, a candy wrapper and seeds help expose the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a Connecticut man's body is found in a burning rental car on a Mexican highway, an insurance company suspects a scam.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a pipe bomb rips through a rural home, killing a young man and seriously injuring his mother, detectives hope that the remnants of a mailing label will lead them to a killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A quiet residential community, shattered by the murder of a neighbor. See how modern techniques helped investigators catch the culprit in less than 12 hours.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man is found dead in his Michigan auto-salvage shop.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man is murdered in a drive-by shooting. When a mobile phone trace incriminates a killer, it's up to a forensic geologist to find evidence that he was at the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is found dead, her boyfriend confesses to her murder. However, in a strange twist, so does another man; police must determine which is the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A high school gym teacher gives his friend a ride home but never returns; his wife and friend receive letters saying he started a new life, but they suspect foul play despite no body being discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl is killed in her own home by her mother and father. Her parents said they acted in self-defense, but the forensic evidence indicates otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man is found stabbed to death after a night in a strip club; a drop of blood on a bedspread becomes critical evidence five years later.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After police identify a murder victim thanks to her butterfly necklace, they discover several co-workers had vendettas against the victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The brutal murder of a construction site foreman looks like the work of a disgruntled employee, but forensic science points to an unlikely suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A shooting victim mutters the name of her apparent assailant before dying, but fingerprint comparisons, handwriting analysis, ballistics and DNA testing show someone else close to home is the true killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman's story seemed far fetched; she tells investigators that a man broke into her home wearing only underwear and gloves, killed her boyfriend and raped and terrorized her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a Delaware man's mother is found dead, he tells a story that's so improbable police think it can't possibly be true.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A family vacation turns into a terrifying search for a missing wife and baby, then becomes a manhunt for a killer who committed a horrific crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A DNA dragnet catches a killer eight years after the kidnapping, rape and murder of a college coed in Oklahoma.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A nosy neighbor with a disturbing obsession becomes a suspect in a woman's murder at an upscale apartment complex; police discover an incredible link to an unrelated murder thousands of miles away.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A college student turns up dead and her boyfriend becomes a prime suspect when blood splatters are discovered on his wall.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Texas police hunt frantically for a brutal rapist. No one knows where he'll strike next, but given the increasingly violent nature of his crimes, he must be found soon.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When detectives find a mismatched button in relation to a woman's death, they know they can follow the clue back to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman heads home after church, but never makes it there alive, triggering a homicide investigation.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Volunteers and police spend weeks searching for a missing girl. A psychic later leads them to a field where the body was found.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A forensic scientist uses his skills to preserve a footprint left in snow to help authorities nab two men suspected of robbing an Ontario couple and shooting the husband in the head.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Fingerprints taken from a piece of cloth help solve the rape and murder of a 22-year-old woman in Henrico County, Va.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The FBI profiles a suspect in the kidnapping and murder of a 6-year-old girl during an evening church service; a witness leads authorities to the likely killer, but then becomes a victim herself.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Photographs found in a dumpster lead to the killer of Los Angeles model Linda Sobek; the man claims he did not intentionally kill her despite evidence to the contrary.
